channel.title: How do I add weapons in Item
channel.description:
Im having problems finding where to add weapons, im pretty sure you add them in Item4 but I can't find a spot for weapons.
Thankyou

item.title: How do I add weapons in Item
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

don’t add them in item.4 just add them in item.cfg
if u want the walking and attacking different look in ur client.java for

public int GetWepAnim()

and just add it in there so it wuld look like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment [playerWeapon] == 6724 || playerEquipment [playerWeapon] == 14478) //bows
{
return 426;
}

just scroll down to find the walk anim etc

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add weapons in Item
